short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock new shopping experience by having a fun extension that gives you coupons and discount deals every time you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A new shopping coupon and deal hidden under scratch card on every tab.Unlock the surprise on every tab.Unlock Savings. Discover Delight. Unleash Value.


Scratchee is the extension that brightens your shopping with a new deals from 10000+ stores across the United States, United Kingdom, Australia, India, and other countries.

Unlock the surprise and save your money with our shopping coupons and deals
